description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=3/3. Get ready for some new one on one action! This is the second game from the one and only 1on1 series on Xbox LIVE Indie Games. Play against many teams in championship. Increase your skills with experience you have earned to get prepared for harder matches and ofcourse: your friends!
